Observed on October 2, 2025, it features effigy burnings, fairs, and marks the end of Navratri. This festival promotes joy, new beginnings, and hope, reminding everyone that goodness always prevails.

title: NCRB data: When crime numbers hide more than they reveal - decoded
description: Delhi is the country's crime capital with 1508.9 IPC cases per lakh population, while Jharkhand reports the fewest. However, Jharkhand's murder rate is significantly higher than Delhi's and Kerala's, suggesting widespread under-reporting of other crimes. This disparity highlights better policing and rigorous crime reporting in states like Delhi and Kerala.

title: Karur stampede fallout: TVK suspends Vijay's rallies; sets norms for key leaders
description: TVK has suspended Vijay's campaign trail across Tamil Nadu, canceling upcoming rallies and instructing district secretaries not to seek police permissions. This decision follows a stampede and legal issues, with Vijay expected to resume campaigning only by late October. Party functionaries are also advised to be cautious on social media.

title: Bill Gates’ personality shift: How his daughter helped; forced him to talk to people
description: Phoebe Gates, Bill Gates' youngest daughter, revealed how she actively helped her shy father overcome his awkwardness from a young age. She recounted pushing him to socialize at events, even father-daughter dances. Phoebe also shared their intense competitive streak, particularly when she introduces new boyfriends, and how she navigates being recognized as "Bill's daughter" by embracing her own identity.

title: Klay Thompson silent on Megan Thee Stallion, chasing Mavericks’ goal
description: Dallas Mavericks' Klay Thompson targets a historic 50/40/90 shooting season, an elite benchmark, after deflecting personal questions at media day. His ambitious individual goal, combined with Kyrie Irving's crucial return from a torn ACL, is pivotal for the Mavericks' playoff aspirations in a highly competitive Western Conference. The team's success hinges on these key performances.
